summary: On a road trip, Nic and two friends are drawn to an isolated area by a computer genius. When everything suddenly goes dark, Nic regains consciousness - only to find himself in a waking nightmare.
cast: Patrick Davidson|Brenton Thwaites|Olivia Cooke|Beau Knapp|Jeffrey Grover|Laurence Fishburne|Roy Kenny|Timothy Holmes|Ricardo Campos|Drew Sykes|Lin Shaye|Robert Longstreet
keywords: road trip|girlfriend in a coma|computer hacker|prosthetic leg|alien contact
